summary: About a year ago, before any screenshots or game-play had been show of Skyrim I created this little Virtual landscape in the Unity 3D Game engine. This was my vision of what the forests and mountains of Skyrim would look like. I don\'t think I was too far off. Download and see for yourself.
descriptionHtml:
About a year ago, before any screenshots or game-play had been show of Skyrim I created this little Virtual landscape in the Unity 3D Game engine. This was my vision of what the forests and mountains of Skyrim would look like. I don\'t think I was too far off. Download and see for yourself.

To play just unzip the files to your Desktop, or elsewhere, and run the exe.

Note: To exit you must use task manager.

Youtube video:   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0sY0dOV2xk0
author: ThorsHand11
